revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Intel |model=Wireless Gateway |revision=II (AP1210) |asin= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WX-6215 |manuf_rev=D |availability=EoL |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/21/2002 |fcc_id=EJM-AP1210, MXF-R910604 |ic_id=1000B-AP1210 |pcb_id=WX2215_V05 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510B |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV160DB |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=GLT |ram1_model=GLT5640L16-7TC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3871 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3684 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8019AS |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=10M |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=Intel Gateway |default_ssid_regex=^Intel Gateway$ |default_ip=192.168.0.10 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:B3 |oui_eth=00:02:B3 }} {{TagLine|Intel Wireless Gateway II}}
"WX2215_V05" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=245538 FCC photos].
This router is near identical to the [[Dell TrueMobile 1184 (WX-6215D)]].. :which, as the name implies, is ''[[Gemtek]]'' model WX-6215D.
*10Mbit WAN, LAN (switched) is 10/100.
===PSU=== The included power adapter is a ''Delta Electronics'' ADP-10SB REV. H :(100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 0.4A -> 5VDC, 2A).
